name: Asteroid Belt Miner
description:
Top-down action-strategy game loosely inspired by Bomberman, with RPG and trading elements. Power-ups have been carefully designed to give you real choices in the way you play the game and provides opportunities for different tactics. The game balancing has been perfected over a year of play testing and fine tuning.

Includes 150 levels grouped in 50 stages. The free demo includes the functionality of about half the game, so it's worth a try.

The only difference between the Win7 and Win8 file versions is the sound driver.
Supports touch screen on Windows 7 or higher.

Notes: If you get an error about files not found, you may have to install "vcredist_x86.exe" from Microsoft:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784

See the readme file for more configuration and troubleshooting options .
